title: Seb Lester Solo Show
content:
Electrik Sheep Gallery Presents... Seb Lester

Electrik Sheep is proud to be hosting Seb Lester’s first solo show  
of exclusive prints and originals.

Sneak preview: [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cVhP1J2BA5M](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071135/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=cVhP1J2BA5M "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cVhP1J2BA5M")

The Electrik Sheep Gallery, Newcastle will be showing a full body of work from  
Seb Lester this August including a number of new limited edition prints and  
originals exclusive to Electrik Sheep. These will complement a selection of  
his well known back catalogue of work which documents his recent foray  
into the world of art.

Seb is "passionate about letterforms" which form the basis for his pieces.  
He brings letters to life with his innovative approach and bold sense  
of humour. Often drawing on racy subject matter and a dazzling array of  
lettering styles he manages to produce thoroughly modern work that  
would look as good on the wall of a New York loft apartment as it would  
in an English country house.

Seb was trained at the renowned Central Saint Martins School of art  
and is internationally known for his typeface designs and illustrations  
which have been used by many of the world’s biggest companies  
and publications including Intel, The New York Times, The Sunday Times,  
Penguin, Faber & Faber and GQ Magazine.

Following on from other exclusive solo shows from Faile, Eelus, Eine  
to name a few the show will open on August 6th at 6pm with one  
of Electrik Sheep's infamous street parties and an after party at  
the Forth Hotel. All pieces will also be released online at the same  
time for those of you unable to make the trip.

See you there!

Electrik Sheep Presents.. Seb Lester

August 6th 2009, 6 pm

Electrik Sheep  
22 Pink Lane  
Newcastle upon Tyne  
NE1 5DW  
UK  
 [www.electriksheep.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071135/http:/www.electriksheep.co.uk/ "www.electriksheep.co.uk")  
 [www.seblester.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071135/http:/www.seblester.co.uk/ "www.seblester.co.uk")
